mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_order(id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, client_id, total_amount, discount_amount, final_amount, invoice_number) VALUES (#{ID}, #{creator}, NOW(), #{creator}, NOW(), #{clientID}, #{totalAmount}, #{discount}, #{finalAmount}, #{invoiceNumber});
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_order SET payment_document = #{fileName}, status='proofUploaded' WHERE id = #{purchaseID}
mapper.select: SELECT invoice_number FROM purchase_order WHERE MONTH(create_time) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(create_time) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
